library(tidyverse)

```{r}
props <- db_fetch("properties", params = list("propertytype" = "materials"), db= "epi_mv")
props <- filter(props, is.na(related_id))
```


```{r}

props <- select(props, tree_order = lemma, tree_id = id, tree_parent = parent_id, tree_level = level, tree_thread = type)

props |> 
  tree_add_mptt()

```
